verbs.description: soccer team owner fate unclear after helicopter crash soccer jerseys flags and flowers [V: were] laid by tearful fans on sunday at leicester city stadium where investigators were examining the remains of a helicopter belonging to the english premier league club owner which crashed in flames after the previous night game no details have been provided by the team about the identities of any passengers or their fate amid reports the thai billionaire owner vichai srivaddhanaprabha was on board aerial footage in daylight showed the charred remains of the helicopter with part of the wreckage covered by a tarpaulin leicester club england king power stadium foxes trust west ham kasper schmeichel leicestershire police greece chatworachet sae - kow eric swaffer ian hubber association football leicester city football club air accidents investigation branch leicester vichai aaron forbes chairman soccer leicester city rikesh vaja manchester united vichai srivaddhanaprabha football king power agustawestland english premier league club central england club thailand izabela roza lechowicz aiyawatt southampton leicester city stadium king power company official bangkok vice chairman central england ian bason english premier league derby srivaddhanaprabha nursara suknamai claudio ranieri premier league air accident investigation branch
